data.title: Ironmaster Production Announces Premiere of “James: The Way of Justice”
data.meta_description: By patricia.ngevao@awokonewspaper.sl Freetown, SIERRA LEONE - Ironmaster Production, in collaboration with Sierra Leonean actor and filmmaker Adeyemi Lardner, is set to bring cinematic excitement to Sierra Leone with the premiere of the film ‘James: The Way of Justice’ on December 1st , 2023. This much-anticipated event will take place at the John James’ Complex,
data.text:
By patricia.ngevao@awokonewspaper.sl

Freetown, SIERRA LEONE – Ironmaster Production, in collaboration with Sierra Leonean actor and filmmaker Adeyemi Lardner, is set to bring cinematic excitement to Sierra Leone with the premiere of the film ‘James: The Way of Justice’ on December 1st , 2023. This much-anticipated event will take place at the John James’ Complex, in Freetown.

The film is a project that not only showcases the talent of Sierra Leonean filmmakers but also brings captivating storytelling and high-quality production to the country’s growing film industry. Directed and produced by Adeyemi Lardner, a US-based Sierra Leonean actor and filmmaker, the movie promises to captivate audiences with its gripping narrative and exceptional cinematography.

Adeyemi Lardner, known for his commitment to showcasing the beauty and culture of Sierra Leone on the international stage, expressed his passion for bringing the film to his home country. He said, “This film is a tribute to the rich heritage and strength of Sierra Leone. It is a proof to the incredible talent and potential of our local film industry. I am honoured to share this movie with the people of Sierra Leone.”

The John James’ Complex, a renowned venue for cultural events and gatherings, is expected to host an array of celebrities, dignitaries, and film lovers for the premiere. Attendees can look forward to a red-carpet experience, with glitz and glamour befitting such a significant cinematic event.

Iron master Production has been a driving force in Sierra Leone’s film industry, and ‘James: The Way of Life’ represents a significant milestone in their mission to promote local talent and storytelling. The film promises to be a must-watch for those who appreciate compelling narratives, powerful performances, and stunning visuals. PSN/11/11/2023
